text: A magician is an entertainer who does illusions and magic tricks by learning about the tricks of the mind and using them to his/her advantage; magicians will occasionally use props, such as a pack of cards. The most famous magicians are: * Harry Houdini * David Copperfield * Jean Eug√®ne Robert-Houdin * David Blaine * P.C. Sorcar * Doug Henning ==Related pages== * List of magicians Category:Entertainment occupations
title: Magician
